description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 田喜荣的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Tian Xirong.

description.zh-cn: 田喜荣的国籍国。
description.en: Country of nationality for Tian Xirong.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，田喜荣是其党员。
description.en: The ruling party of China, of which Tian Xirong is a member.

nodes.id: 中国共产党朔州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党朔州市委员会

nodes.id: 中国共产党长治市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党长治市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任朔州市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former mayor of the Shuozhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任朔州市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former mayor of the Shuozhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党朔州市委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former secretary of the CPC Shuozhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党朔州市委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former secretary of the CPC Shuozhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党长治市委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former secretary of the CPC Changzhi Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，任山西省委政策研究室副主任。
description.en: In 2000, he became Deputy Director of the Policy Research Office of the Shanxi Provincial Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，担任山西省政协秘书长。
description.en: In 2003, he served as Secretary-General of the Shanxi Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 2006年，任山西省朔州市委副书记、市长。
description.en: In 2006, he served as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shuozhou Municipal Committee and Mayor of Shuozhou.

relationships.target: 中国共产党朔州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年，任朔州市委书记。
description.en: In 2008, he became Secretary of the CPC Shuozhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2008年，担任全国人大代表。
description.en: In 2008, he served as a deputy to the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国共产党长治市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2011年1月，改任长治市委书记。
description.en: In January 2011, he was reassigned as Secretary of the CPC Changzhi Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2013年3月田喜荣兼任山西省总工会党组书记。
description.en: In March 2013, Tian Xirong concurrently served as Party Group Secretary of the Shanxi Provincial Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 田喜荣接替张建欣出任朔州市人民政府市长。
description.en: Tian Xirong succeeded Zhang Jianxin as Mayor of the Shuozhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 田喜荣卸任朔州市人民政府市长，由冯改朵接任。
description.en: Tian Xirong stepped down as Mayor of the Shuozhou Municipal People's Government, and was succeeded by Feng Gaiduo.

description.zh-cn: 田喜荣接替王雅安出任中国共产党朔州市委员会书记。
description.en: Tian Xirong succeeded Wang Ya'an as Secretary of the CPC Shuozhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 田喜荣卸任中国共产党朔州市委员会书记，由王茂设接任。
description.en: Tian Xirong stepped down as Secretary of the CPC Shuozhou Municipal Committee, and was succeeded by Wang Maoshe.

description.zh-cn: 田喜荣接替杜善学出任中国共产党长治市委员会书记。
description.en: Tian Xirong succeeded Du Shanxue as Secretary of the CPC Changzhi Municipal Committee.
